description:
The Vampire Diaries has seen its fair share of surprising hookups over the past five seasons, but it has yet to explore the possibility of Bamon — Bonnie and Damon. Well, it turns out Vampire Diaries star Kat Graham is a Bamon shipper!《吸血鬼日记》第五季的男男女女们继续互相勾搭，不过现在似乎没有看到Bamon——Bonnie和Damon这一对擦出火花。不过Bonnie的扮演者Kat Graham最盼望的是Bonnie和Damon滚床单哦。

When Just Jared asked the 24-year-old which of her co-stars she’d like to have a sexy scene with, Kat replied, “Ian [Somerhalder].” But it’s not because Ian is a total hottie!被娱乐网站Just Jared问到她最想和《吸血鬼日记》哪位演员拍床戏，Kat回答：“Ian（Somerhalder）。”不过她可不是因为Ian性感才想和他拍床戏的。

She added: “Everyone is going to be like, ‘Oh it’s because he’s so hot.’ But it’s actually because we work the exact same way with [our acting coach] Ivana Chubbuck, and I think we would just do the most interesting work together as actors. That’s the only reason.”她补充说：“所有人都以为，‘那是因为他很性感。’其实真正原因是因为我们都是Ivana Chubbuck的徒弟，我觉得能演对手戏会很有意思，这也是我想和他拍床戏的真正原因。”

Catch the next episode of The Vampire Diaries on Thursday, January 23, 2014 at 8 p.m. ET on the CW, followed by an all-new episode of Reign.《吸血鬼日记》下一集将会在2014年1月24日在CW台《风中女王》之后回归。
